traits.name: Infernal Blade
traits.desc: The enforcer has an infernal blade bound to it. This weapon ignores all resistances and deals an extra 3 (1d6) fire damage with each attack (included in the attack). In addition, while the enforcer is wielding this blade, it cannot be disarmed.

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc: The enforcer is a 6th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). It regains these expended spellslots when it finishes a short or long rest. The enforcer has the following warlock spells prepared: * Cantrips (at will): blade ward, eldritch blast, mage hand * 1st-3rd level (3 3rd-level slots): armor of Agathys, crown of madness, fear, hellish rebuke, hex, spider climb

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The enforcer makes two attacks with its felblade and one with its felstrike.

actions.name: Felblade
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Felstrike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Infernal Onslaught (3/Short Rest)
actions.desc: The enforcer performs a swift series of punches to launch bursts of flame at up to four targets within 60 feet. Each of those creatures must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw, saving 17 (5d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful save.
